subject: Diode suggestion (was: Diode EVP Capture Device I built)
author: Bagheera BL
full_text:
My plans were to duplicate your diode box and left it running for days.  I'm guessing that spirits may need some time to work the device and by inviting them and letting them experiment it freely, they might be able to use it as wished.  In theory, they should be able to get a so clear a transmission through the diodes that they would be able to send music... theoricly-theorising-speaking theory.  Too bad I'm so busy with the mundane at the moment.


By the way, you need to name that box :-)

Vincent Rodrigue, SQIP

De : M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...>

communication...
